'''Amazing Gift (Furnishing)''' is a quest reward during ''[[Pen Pals, Book Reviews, and the Super Lucky General]]''.

Once obtained, it is automatically exchanged for the similar [[Mt. Yougou Night Walk Red Kitsune Doll]] furnishing.
